Light show
 




Vincent Lecavalier celebrates his fourth goal of the postseason.  (AP)



    

    

      The Lightning strike at home, edging the Devils 3-2 on a third-period Vaclav Prospal goal for a 
      2-1 series lead. Guess who also scores? Possible MVP Vincent Lecavalier, perhaps the NHL's best player, Wes Goldstein says.

 Rutgers star carrying draft's white runner's burden


    

      
      He's labeled a fullback, but wants to be a tailback. One problem: He's 
      white. Pete Prisco  says 
      in a league owned by black runners, Leonard looks to stiff-arm a 
      stereotype.

 NASCAR Power Rankings: Stremme making his move


    

      
      David Stremme struggled as a Nextel Cup rookie, but 2006 is ancient 
      history now. He's on the fast track after his first top 10 
      Sunday in Texas, Brian De Los Santos says.
